field.comment:
The id of the owner (if any) for central management. Note that the name _combined_ with the ownerId must be unique. Otherwise we don't know where incoming logs should go. The owner id is initially the id of the identity that created it. Later on it can be reassigned to another identity for central management.
At all times the combination of name & ownerid must be unique.
Event in such cases however, multiple hits can occur, if you assign one server identity to multiple central identities. Across those central identities you can still have naming collissions.
field.name: ownerId
